definition: a gun/guns in general/same as 槍支|枪支
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc

sentences.english: And who are these illegal gun dealers?
sentences.chinese: 谁是非法枪枝经销商呢？

sentences.english: Ammunition must be tested using the competitor's firearm.
sentences.chinese: 弹药必须使用选手的枪枝来做测试。

sentences.english: If a competitor holsters a firearm during the course of fire, the following will apply.
sentences.chinese: 如果选手在比赛中将枪枝收回枪套，应适用下列条件。

sentences.english: The guns captured will aggregate in all probability five or six hundred.
sentences.chinese: 所获的枪枝合计当在五六百之数。

sentences.english: They surrendered their guns to the police.
However, many Swiss committee suicide by using such guns;
sentences.chinese: 不过，很多瑞士人就用当兵时公家发的枪枝自杀。

sentences.english: So my advice to the government is to supervise seriously to the gun and bullets.
sentences.chinese: 所以我对政府的建议是对枪枝及子弹采取严厉控管。

sentences.english: The police seized the gun from the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 警察从罪犯身上夺走了枪枝。

sentences.english: Do you think the government should lift the ban on guns ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为政府应该解除枪枝的禁令吗？

sentences.english: The competitor shall, holster the handgun in the one of the safe conditions below.
sentences.chinese: 选手必须将枪枝设为下述的安全状态并收回枪套之中。

sentences.english: Of course, there still have offer the aim-point equipped guns for players in.
sentences.chinese: 大多射击游戏仍然为玩家提供具有描具的枪枝。

sentences.english: Several other American cities also ban handguns and other weapons.
sentences.chinese: 其它一些美国城市也禁止枪枝和其它武器。

definition: rifle (loanword)/also written 來復槍|来复枪
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
cocaine (loanword)/also written 可卡因[ke3 ka3 yin1]
